categories: Category:Songs by The Emperor's New Clothes

nodes.text: "The New Order" was a song by the pro-Imperial minga musical group The Emperor's New Clothes from Totally Patriotic, a compilation album available by the time period between 0 ABY and 4 ABY. "The New Order" received approval by the Imperial Board of Culture, as was the case with all of The Emperor's New Clothes' music.
"The New Order" was first mentioned in Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, a 1993 supplement to West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game written by Simon Smith and Eric S. Trautmann.
